Animated Flaming Mace/Flail (Female)
kDesc
Fashioned within the flaming forge of fire. Flames blaze from its head. [#Legal]
Forgée dans le brasier de la forge. L'extrémité de la masse dégage des flammes. [#Legal]
In der flammenden Schmiede des Feuers geformt. Die Spitze stößt Flammen aus. [#Legal]
Modellata in una fiammeggiante forgia di fuoco. Fiamme erompono dalla sommità. [#Legal]
Creada dentro de la feroz forja flamígera. De su cabeza emanan llamas. [#Legal]
용암에서 태어나고, 화산재로 담금질한 무기입니다. 살아 움직이는 불꽃이 보입니다. [#Legal]
Fashioned within the flaming forge of fire. Flames blaze from its head. [#Legal]
於洪洪烈火中成形，前端發出火焰。[#Legal]
於洪洪烈火中成形，前端發出火焰。[#Legal]
Fashioned within the flaming forge of fire. Flames blaze from its head. [#Legal]
